content: bebelle 2025 by petra breakstone a lovely oversized cowl/poncho knitted top down with a little bit of a rolled neckline it then grows down from there an eyelet row just before the colorful stripes knitted with a lightly skein only 2 ends to weave in and finally a bulky chenille frames the bottom edge the bebelle measures 74 around the bottom edge and 13 5 in length abbreviations the pattern is fully written co - cast on enjoy the knit eor - end of round k - knit kfb - knit in front and back of same stitch k2tog - knit 2 stitches together yarn p - purl repeat - repeat c1 - organic cotton 125 yards in dk weight sts - stitches yo - yarn over c2 - lightly skein 238 yards each skein has 7 color changes in 1 or 2 fingering weights and the rest in lace weights the skeins are gauge wound to order 16 sts and 24 row in 4 of stockinette stitch c3 - chenille bulky weight 24 yards with c1 yarn knit kits/yarn available at yarnz2go techniques applied knitted in the round purling increasing notions decreasing color and yarn changes bind off loosely weave in ends and blocking us size 7 4 5 mm circular needles one 16 42 cm and one 29 74 cm in lengths level of expertise stitch marker tapestry needle or crochet hook for finishing advanced beginner © petra breakstone enjoy your project~ page 1 of 2 bebelle 2025 by petra breakstone note when knitting with the slightly skein simply start with the heavier end of skein when knitting from your stash use 7 portions of 34 yards each in the yarn weights as follows starting with a light fingering weight followed by six lace weight yarns if using 2 fingering weights then end with the second one part 1 getting started with c1 part 3 stripes with c2 co 88 sts i used the easy loop method knit 6 row knit 6 rounds part 4 garter rounds with c2 part 2 increases with c1 round 1 purl first increase round 2 knit round 1 k3 kfb repeat to eor 110 sts repeat rounds 1 and 2 5 more times rounds 2 to 5 knit second increase part 4 stockinette with c2 round 1 k4 kfb repeat to eor 132 sts rounds 2 to 5 knit knit 19 rounds third increase round 1 k5 kfb repeat to eor 154 sts part 5 eyelets with c2 rounds 2 to 5 knit round 1 k2tog k4 yo k5 yo repeat to last fourth increase 2 sts k2tog 276 sts round 1 k6 kfb red to eor 176 sts rounds 2 and 3 knit rounds 2 to 5 knit fifth increase round 1 k7 kfb repeat to eor 198 sts part 6 edging with c3 rounds 2 to 5 knit knit one round and bind off loosely sixth increase round 1 k6 yo repeat to eor 231 sts rounds 2 to 5
